name: A World Apart (Luna Wolf Studios)
description:
A World Apart:
Control different points of view as you work your way through a spooky jungle, and an eerie dungeon. Careful of whats waiting for you though... can you make it out alive?

Background:
This game was made in less than 5 days for the IndieGameStand Game Jam, sponsored by Wilmington University. The theme for the game jam was 'Point of View'.
